tool_description:
query ted.com talks with ease. featuring free text search and more!
gathering data from ted.com & youTube so you get full details of ted talks
name: TED
title: TED

api_list.name: transcript by youTube video id
api_list.description: enter youtube video id, for example:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rDiGYuQicpA (rDiGYuQicpA is the id)

required_parameters.name: youtubeId
required_parameters.description: youtube id of the desired transcript

api_list.name: talk by youTube Id
api_list.description: get talk details by its youTube Id

required_parameters.name: youtubeId
required_parameters.description: talk youTube Id - for example from url: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rDiGYuQicpA

api_list.name: talks by speaker
api_list.description: enter speaker name and get all talks by this speaker

api_list.name: talks by name
api_list.description: enter talk name and get talk details

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: get talks details by name (free text search)

api_list.name: transcripts text search
api_list.description: we will look in all ted talks transcripts for your input text (free text search)

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: enter text to search in all talks transcript

api_list.name: talks by description
api_list.description: search ted talks by talks description

required_parameters.name: description
required_parameters.description: search ted talks by talk description (free text search)
